name: meadow vine reversible cable scarf
notes:
**this meadow vine reversible cable scarf knitting pattern** creates a beautiful interlocking design inspired by nature. this full-sized adult scarf is knitted in chunky yarn with alternating rope cable columns that display equally on both sides.

**scarf size**
• unblocked: 6.5 inches (16.5 cm) wide and 70 inches (178 cm) long
• blocked: 7 inches (18 cm) wide and 76 inches (193 cm) long

**active time to complete**
i estimate this pattern takes approximately 24 to 32 hours to complete. want to knit it faster? you may adjust your length and/or width accordingly if desired. additionally, you may modify this pattern with different yarn weights and appropriately sized knitting needles.

**knitting techniques**
• co = cast on long tail
• k = knit stitch 
• p = purl stitch
• 4/4r = right crossing reversible cable
• 4/4l = left crossing reversible cable
• cast off
• weave in yarn tails

**blocking:** for the best results, i encourage blocking your piece. as a result, doing so allows the meadow vine cable texture to display beautifully, as well as creating a more pliable piece.
